name: What's Left
description:
WHAT'S LEFT
A classic Zelda-styled action/adventure game with unique mechanics and story.

FEATURES
- Top-down real time combat
- Exploration and puzzles
- Boss battles
- Unique weapons and tools, gameplay mechanics and intense set pieces

STORY
Time is fluid. It flows on indifferent to all it affects and everyone makes does their best in the moment with the resources they have. Forces our hands. Makes us decide, and people make mistakes. It destroys some, strengthens others, but one thing holds true; it defines all.
Landon Ferngrass is no different and now closing in on a legendary artifact that just might be the key to setting things right. Joined by a shapeshifting companion, Picaro, the two friends follow a 200 year old trail across the globe in search of redemption. But, as health fails, secrets slip and desperation takes hold, they are pushed to their ultimate limits.

CONTENT WARNING
What's Left has horror elements, adult situations and partial nudity. You've been warned.
